name: Premium Organic Onions
description: Experience the pungent, sweet, and complex flavors of our premium organic onions, meticulously grown for chefs, home cooks, and health-conscious individuals who demand the highest quality. Featuring a crisp texture and papery, golden-brown skin that is easy to peel, these onions are packed with antioxidants and flavonoids. The firm, juicy white flesh is perfect for caramelizing, sautéing, or using raw in salads and salsas. Grown in nutrient-rich soil without synthetic pesticides or herbicides, these onions represent the pinnacle of organic farming.
specification:
• Type: Yellow Onions
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
  • Weight: Approx. 1lb per bag
  • Origin: California organic farms
  • Shelf Life: Up to 2 months in cool, dry place

name: Sun-Ripened Organic Strawberries
description: Exemplifying summer sweetness and vibrant color, these organic strawberries represent the perfect synthesis of flavor and nutrition. Meticulously hand-picked at the peak of ripeness, each berry features a brilliant red hue, a juicy texture, and a naturally sweet flavor with a hint of tartness. Grown using sustainable farming practices that protect the ecosystem and soil health.
specification:
• Type: Albion Strawberries
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
  • Weight: 1 Pint container
  • Origin: Oregon organic farms
  • Shelf Life: 3-5 days refrigerated

name: Fresh Organic Kale Sprouts
description: Crafted with meticulous attention to sustainability and nutrition, these premium organic kale sprouts represent the future of microgreens. Packed with an incredible concentration of vitamins, minerals, and enzymes, these tender sprouts offer a mild, slightly peppery flavor that is less bitter than mature kale.
specification:
• Type: Kale Sprouts
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
  • Weight: 2oz clamshell
  • Origin: Colorado vertical farm
  • Shelf Life: 5-7 days refrigerated

name: Crisp Organic Cucumbers
description: Expertly grown by local organic farmers, these crisp cucumbers represent the perfect marriage of refreshing taste and hydrating properties. Each cucumber is firm, with a vibrant dark green skin and a cool, moist interior that is incredibly thirst-quenching. The mild, subtly sweet flavor makes them perfect for salads and snacking.
specification:
• Type: Slicing Cucumber
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
  • Weight: Sold individually
  • Origin: Michigan organic farms
  • Shelf Life: 1 week refrigerated

description: Unleash the full flavor of summer with our Heirloom Organic Tomatoes. Grown from non-GMO seeds passed down through generations, these tomatoes come in a stunning array of colors, shapes, and sizes, each with a unique, complex flavor profile ranging from sweet to tangy.
specification:
• Type: Assorted Heirloom
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
  • Weight: Sold per pound
  • Origin: New Jersey family farm

name: Organic Hass Avocados
description: Enjoy the creamy, rich texture and healthy fats of our Organic Hass Avocados. Known for their nutty flavor and versatile nature, these avocados are a powerhouse of nutrition. The bumpy, dark green skin turns nearly black when perfectly ripe, revealing the buttery, pale green flesh inside.
specification:
• Type: Hass Avocado
  • Certification: USDA Organic Certified
